Name: {{unplayable}}
Notes: For games that do not work.

Name: {{intro}}
Notes: For games that will not progress past the boot screens.

Name: {{menus}}
Notes: For games that will not progress past the menus.

Name: {{in-game}}
Notes: For games that you can actually play with issues.

Name: {{playable}}
Notes: For games with very minor or no issues.
